attributes.action: war criminal general pervaiz musharaf should go back pakistan from london for trial
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Brown ,as you know that ex president of pakistan general musharaf is currently living in london ,he is the war criminal ,the courts of pakistan sent him notices to appear for trial but he is not going back ,because he killed thousands men ,woen and child in pakistan ,he killed baloch leader nawab bugty ,he killed his political opponents ,he killed children  in lal mosque ,it is not justice that the person who is involed in many crimes ,and now wgen the courts and the nation wants to see him in local courts ,he is livinghere in london happily ,nothing is wrong and false in this statemnt .he is a proved criminal ,you should play your role to make efforts to appear in local courts .

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
